project_descr: The project is in line with  GEF-6 strategic focal area on climate change mitigation, objective CCM3 on fostering enabling conditions to mainstream mitigation concerns into sustainable development strategies.

outputs.output_descr: The objective of this project is to enable Belize to prepare its Fourth National Communication (FNC) under decision 17/CP7 and the First Biennial Update Report (BUR) under decision 2/CP17 of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change.
